DOC.detailed_description: Exclusively formula-fed infants will participate in two 2-week feeding periods of 2 infant formulas. Daily tolerance records will be kept by caregivers.
DOC.criteria: Healthy newborn infant Fullterm (> 37 weeks gestation) 02 months (birth56 days) of age on enrollment Infant exclusively formulafed for at least 2 days prior to enrollment Having obtained his/her legal representative's informed consent Known or suspected cowmilk allergy Congenital illness or malformation Significant prenatal and/or postnatal disease Currently participating in another clinical study
